task.title: Domes
task.shortdesc: You can create a three-dimensional dome. The latitude lines of a dome are always parallel with the xy plane of the current UCS; the central axis is always parallel with the z-axis. You position a dome by specifying its center point. You determine the size of a dome by specifying either its radius or its diameter.

context.p: To create a dome as a three-dimensionalsurface

step.cmd: Choose Draw > Surfaces > 3D Surfaces from the mainmenu.
On the command line, type DO (DOme).
Specify the center andradius or diameter as described previously.
